name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instance selector for Azure App Service Kudu

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Launch Azure App Service Kudu or console with selecting an instance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In Azure App Service for Linux, where multiple instances are running, it is difficult to make an SSH connection to the intended instance.
This extension makes it easy for you to do that.
